Class ViteImport

java.lang.Object
jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.SimpleTagSupport
io.github.benny123tw.servlet.tags.ViteImport
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.SimpleTag
public class ViteImport extends jakarta.servlet.jsp.tagext.SimpleTagSupport
Custom JSP tag to import Vite-generated assets.
